qas.question: What year did color broadcasts start in the US?

When did Europe begin color broadcasts?

The PAL and SECAM were black and white systems where?
How many lines of resolution were the European color broadcasts?

context: Colour broadcasts started at similarly higher resolutions, first with the US NTSC color system in <a0_0><b5_0>1953<b5_0/>,<a0_0/> which was compatible with the earlier monochrome systems and therefore had the same <a1_0><b6_0>525<b6_0/><a1_0/> lines of resolution. <a3_0><b8_0>Europe<a3_0/>an<b8_0/> standards did not follow until the <a2_0><b7_0>1960s<b7_0/><a2_0/>, when the PAL and SECAM color systems were added to the monochrome <a4_0><b9_0>625<b9_0/><a4_0/> line broadcasts.
